sentences.english: The morning mail has just been delivered.
sentences.chinese: 早晨的邮件刚送到。

sentences.english: Do you deliver on Saturdays?
sentences.chinese: 星期六你们送货吗？

sentences.english: I’m having some flowers delivered for her birthday.
sentences.chinese: 我在安排人给她送花祝贺生日。

detailed_translations.english: to take goods, letters, packages etc to a particular place or person

sentences.english: I locked the door and dropped the keys in my purse.
sentences.chinese: 我锁上门，然后把钥匙丢进手提包里。

detailed_translations.chinese: (女士)手提袋；(国家、家庭、团体等的) 财力
detailed_translations.english: a bag in which a woman carries her money and personal things
if you purse your lips, you bring them together tightly into a small circle, especially to show disapproval or doubt

sentences.english: Johnson has filed suit against her.
sentences.chinese: 约翰逊对她提起了诉讼。

sentences.english: a civil suit
sentences.chinese: 民事诉讼

sentences.english: There are countryside walks to suit everyone.
sentences.chinese: 有适合每个人的乡村步行路径。

detailed_translations.english: a problem or complaint that a person or company brings to a court of law to be settled
to be acceptable, suitable, or  convenient  for a particular person or in a particular situation

sentences.english: a brick wall
sentences.chinese: 砖墙

sentences.english: a house made of brick
sentences.chinese: 砖房

sentences.english: Protesters attacked the police with stones and bricks.
sentences.chinese: 抗议者用石头和砖块袭击警察。

detailed_translations.english: a hard block of baked clay used for building walls, houses etc

sentences.english: She’s gone to Italy on a special assignment.
sentences.chinese: 她去意大利执行一项特殊任务。

sentences.english: a history assignment
sentences.chinese: 历史作业

detailed_translations.english: a piece of work that is given to someone as part of their job

sentences.english: Have you signed the hotel register ?
sentences.chinese: 你在酒店登记簿上签名了吗？

sentences.english: Police want a national register of DNA samples.
sentences.chinese: 警方想要一个全国范围的DNA样本登记册。

sentences.english: How many students have registered for English classes?
sentences.chinese: 有多少学生注册选修英语课了？

detailed_translations.english: an official list of names of people, companies etc, or a book that has this list
to put someone’s or something’s name on an official list

sentences.english: It’s a good idea to do some research before you buy a house.
sentences.chinese: 买房子之前作些了解，这想法很对。

sentences.english: Gould was helped in his researches by local naturalists.
sentences.chinese: 古尔德在研究过程中得到了当地博物学家的帮助。

sentences.english: He’s been researching material for a documentary.
sentences.chinese: 他一直在研究材料，准备做一个纪录片。

detailed_translations.english: the activity of finding information about something that you are interested in or need to know about
to study a subject in detail, especially in order to discover new facts or test new ideas

sentences.english: She moistenend  the soil round the plant.
sentences.chinese: 她把植物周围的土壤弄湿。

detailed_translations.english: to make something dirty, especially with waste from your body
to make something dirty, especially with waste from your body

sentences.english: Rome was his main place of residence.
sentences.chinese: 罗马是他的主要居住地。

sentences.english: the ambassador’s official residence
sentences.chinese: 大使官邸

detailed_translations.english: the state of living in a place

sentences.english: an interior designer
sentences.chinese: 室内装潢设计师

sentences.english: a software designer
sentences.chinese: 软件设计师

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to make plans or patterns for clothes, furniture, equipment etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 由设计师专门设计的；享有盛名的；赶时髦的
detailed_translations.english: made by a well-known and fashionable designer

sentences.english: ...a new board game played with dice.
sentences.chinese: ...一种用骰子玩的新棋盘游戏

detailed_translations.english: an indoor game played on a specially designed board made of thick card or wood

sentences.english: a meat locker
sentences.chinese: 肉类冷藏间

detailed_translations.chinese: 柜，箱；上锁的人；有锁的橱柜；锁扣装置；有锁的存物柜
detailed_translations.english: a small cupboard with a lock in a school, sports building, office etc, where you can leave clothes or possessions while you do something

sentences.english: the story of life on a small farm at the turn of the century
sentences.chinese: 讲述世纪初一个小农场生活的故事

detailed_translations.english: one of the 100-year periods measured from before or after the year of Christ’s birth

sentences.english: More than 75% of the land is used for agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 75%以上的土地用于农耕。

detailed_translations.chinese: 农业；农耕；农业生产；农艺，农学
detailed_translations.english: the practice or science of farming

sentences.english: a fair maiden
sentences.chinese: 美丽的少女

detailed_translations.english: pleasant and attractive

sentences.english: efforts to bring peace to the region
sentences.chinese: 给这个地区带来和平的努力

detailed_translations.english: a large area of a country or of the world, usually without exact limits

sentences.english: For more information on weight loss and healthy eating, visit our website.
sentences.chinese: 有关减肥和健康饮食的更多信息，请访问我们的网站。

detailed_translations.chinese: 网站（全球资讯网的主机站）
detailed_translations.english: a place on the Internet where you can find information about something, especially a particular organization

sentences.english: formal recognition of the reformed church
sentences.chinese: 改革后的教会所获得的官方承认

sentences.english: a formal agreement between the countries
sentences.chinese: 两国间的正式协议

sentences.english: There is no formal structure for negotiating pay increases.
sentences.chinese: 加薪谈判没有正式的框架可循。

detailed_translations.english: made or done officially or publicly

sentences.english: I’d just returned from covering the Cambodian war.
sentences.chinese: 我刚报道完柬埔寨战争回来。

detailed_translations.english: to report the details of an event for a newspaper or a television or radio programme

sentences.english: child development
sentences.chinese: 儿童发育

sentences.english: The funds will be used for marketing and product development.
sentences.chinese: 这笔资金将用于市场营销和产品开发。

detailed_translations.english: the process of gradually becoming bigger, better, stronger, or more advanced

sentences.english: shelves of books
sentences.chinese: 一层层书架的书

sentences.english: supermarket shelves
sentences.chinese: 超级市场的货架

sentences.english: the amount of shelf space available
sentences.chinese: 可用的货架空间

detailed_translations.english: a long flat narrow board attached to a wall or in a frame or cupboard, used for putting things on

sentences.english: We’ll save a lot of time if we go by car.
sentences.chinese: 我们要是开车去，可以节省很多时间。

sentences.english: Everyone is being encouraged to save energy.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都被鼓励节约能源。

sentences.english: ways to save money on heating bills
sentences.chinese: 节省取暖费的种种办法

detailed_translations.english: to use less money, time, energy etc so that you do not waste any

sentences.english: The show attracts a regular audience of about 20 million.
sentences.chinese: 这个节目吸引了大约两千万固定观众收看。

sentences.english: Goya was one of the first painters to look for a wider audience for his work.
sentences.chinese: 戈雅是最早为自己的作品寻找更多观赏者的画家之一。

detailed_translations.english: the people who watch or listen to a particular programme, or who see or hear a particular artist’s, writer’s etc work

sentences.english: Ice needs heat to melt.
sentences.chinese: 冰需要热才能融化。

sentences.english: Insulating the attic is a good way to reduce heat loss.
sentences.chinese: 为阁楼安装隔热层是减少热量流失的好方法。

sentences.english: The heat was making them tired.
sentences.chinese: 炎热的天气令他们疲倦。

sentences.english: Heat the milk until it boils.
sentences.chinese: 把牛奶煮开。

detailed_translations.english: warmth or the quality of being hot
to make something become warm or hot

sentences.english: All the main economic indicators suggest that trade is improving.
sentences.chinese: 所有主要的经济指标都表明贸易情况正在改善。

detailed_translations.chinese: 指示器；[试剂] 指示剂；[计] 指示符；压力计
detailed_translations.english: something that can be regarded as a sign of something else

sentences.english: By comparison, one kilogram of tomatoes requires 160 litres of water.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，生产一公斤的番茄需要160升水。

sentences.english: For example, the kilogram scale allows you to assign a number to an object indicating its weight based upon standardized displacements of measuring instruments.
sentences.chinese: 例如，千克尺度允许您给一个物体分配数字，根据测量仪器的标准化的偏移量指示该物体的重量。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring weight, equal to 1,000 grams

sentences.english: specially trained police dogs
sentences.chinese: 经过专门训练的警犬

detailed_translations.english: for one particular purpose, and only for that purpose

sentences.english: traditional Italian cooking
sentences.chinese: 传统的意大利烹饪

sentences.english: a traditional Irish folk song
sentences.chinese: 传统的爱尔兰民歌

sentences.english: a traditional method of brewing beer
sentences.chinese: 传统的啤酒酿造方法

detailed_translations.english: being part of the traditions of a country or group of people

sentences.english: They refused to give me a refund .
sentences.chinese: 他们拒绝给我退款。

sentences.english: Return your purchase within 14 days for a full refund .
sentences.chinese: 14 天之内退货可以全额退款。

sentences.english: You should go down there and demand a refund.
sentences.chinese: 你应该到那里去，要求退款。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that is given back to you if you are not satisfied with the goods or services that you have paid for
to give someone their money back, especially because they are not satisfied with the goods or services they have paid for

sentences.english: Two lucky employees won a round-the-world trip.
sentences.chinese: 两名幸运的雇员赢得一次环游世界的机会。

sentences.english: It’s an 80-mile round trip (= a journey to a place and back again ) to Exeter.
sentences.chinese: 到埃克塞特往返有80英里。

sentences.english: I’m afraid you’ve had a wasted trip (= a trip in which you do not achieve your purpose ) . Mr Burgess has already left.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕你是白来一趟了，伯吉斯先生已经走了。

sentences.english: He was unable to make the trip to accept the award.
sentences.chinese: 他无法前去领奖。

detailed_translations.english: a visit to a place that involves a journey, for pleasure or a particular purpose
to hit something with your foot by accident so that you fall or almost fall

sentences.english: His mother’s very sick.
sentences.chinese: 他母亲病得很重。

sentences.english: Maria can’t come in today because she’s sick.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚因为生病今天不能来了。

sentences.english: a sick child
sentences.chinese: 生病的孩子

sentences.english: a sick animal
sentences.chinese: 患病的动物

sentences.english: What will happen to the business if you fall sick (= become ill ) or die?
sentences.chinese: 假如你生病或是去世了，公司怎么办？

sentences.english: He took sick (= became ill ) and died a week later.
sentences.chinese: 他病倒后一周就去世了。

sentences.english: Pete’s at home in bed, sick as a dog (= very sick ) .
sentences.chinese: 皮特卧床在家，病得很重。

detailed_translations.chinese: 厌恶的；病态的；不舒服；渴望的；恶心的 ；生病的
detailed_translations.english: suffering from a disease or illness
people who are ill

sentences.english: Ellis Island has become one of America's most popular tourist destinations.
sentences.chinese: 埃利斯岛已经成为美国最受欢迎的游览地之一。

detailed_translations.english: the place that someone or something is going to

sentences.english: I should warn you in advance that I’m not a very good dancer.
sentences.chinese: 我要先提醒你，我跳舞不是很好。

sentences.english: Many thanks, in advance, for your help.
sentences.chinese: 对你的帮助预先表示万分感谢。

sentences.english: Could you distribute copies well in advance of the meeting?
sentences.chinese: 开会前把复印件早早分发下去，好吗？

sentences.english: A line of US tanks slowly advanced.
sentences.chinese: 一列美军坦克缓缓前进。

detailed_translations.english: before something happens or is expected to happen
to move towards someone or something, especially in a slow and determined way – used especially to talk about soldiers

sentences.english: It’s our last match of the season.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们本赛季最后一场比赛。

sentences.english: They’re preparing for a big match tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 他们在为明天的一场大赛做准备。

sentences.english: McClaire’s goal earned him the title of man of the match (= the person in a team who plays best ) .
sentences.chinese: 麦克莱尔的进球为他赢得了“本场最佳球员”的称号。

sentences.english: Carlos was no match for the champion.
sentences.chinese: 卡洛斯根本不是冠军的对手。

detailed_translations.english: an organized sports event between two teams or people

sentences.english: We measured the length and width of the living room.
sentences.chinese: 我们量了客厅的长和宽。

sentences.english: You’ll need several pieces of string of different lengths.
sentences.chinese: 你需要几根长度不等的绳子。

sentences.english: a length of rope/pipe/wire etc
sentences.chinese: 一段绳子/管子/电线等

detailed_translations.english: the measurement of how long something is from one end to the other

sentences.english: a cleaner that will remove wine stains
sentences.chinese: 可去除葡萄酒酒渍的清洁剂

sentences.english: The college removed rules that prevented women from enrolling.
sentences.chinese: 这所大学取消了禁止女性入学的规定。

detailed_translations.english: to get rid of something so that it does not exist any longer

sentences.english: I find it hard to cope with change.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得很难适应变化。

sentences.english: scientists worried about climatic change
sentences.chinese: 为气候变化感到担忧的科学家们

sentences.english: A change in personality may mean your teenager has a drug problem.
sentences.chinese: 十几岁的孩子如果性格上发生了变化，可能意味着有吸毒问题。

sentences.english: No major changes were made to the book.
sentences.chinese: 这本书没有大的修改。

sentences.english: She had a change of heart (= change in attitude ) and decided to stay.
sentences.chinese: 她改变主意，决定留下来。

sentences.english: Family life has undergone dramatic change in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来家庭生活发生了巨大的变化。

sentences.english: Matt emptied the loose change from his pockets.
sentences.chinese: 马特把口袋里所有的零钱都掏了出来。

detailed_translations.english: the process or result of something or someone becoming different

sentences.english: He’s outside in the garden.
sentences.chinese: 他在外面花园里。

sentences.english: Grace brought us some flowers from her garden.
sentences.chinese: 格雷丝给我们送来一些她花园里的花。

sentences.english: the botanical gardens in Edinburgh
sentences.chinese: 爱丁堡的植物园

detailed_translations.english: piece of land next to or around your house where you can grow flowers, fruit, vegetables, etc., usually with an area of grass(called a lawn )

sentences.english: He had overfilled the jug.
sentences.chinese: 他把罐子装得太满了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 装得太多， 装到满溢
detailed_translations.english: to put too much of something into a container

sentences.english: They had recrossed the River Gambia by ferry.
sentences.chinese: 他们乘船又一次渡过了冈比亚河。

sentences.english: The ship was used to ferry supplies to Russia during the war.
sentences.chinese: 这艘船在战时被用来往俄罗斯 运送补给。

detailed_translations.english: a boat that carries people or goods across a river or a narrow area of water
to carry people or things a short distance from one place to another in a boat or other vehicle

sentences.english: a plastic spoon
sentences.chinese: 塑料汤匙

sentences.english: plastic bags
sentences.chinese: 塑料袋

detailed_translations.english: made of plastic

sentences.english: a waterproof jacket
sentences.chinese: 防水上衣

sentences.english: waterproof adhesive
sentences.chinese: 防水黏合剂

sentences.english: Rub the wax in to make the shoe waterproof.
sentences.chinese: 在鞋子上抹点蜡使其防水。

detailed_translations.english: not allowing water to enter
a jacket or coat that does not allow rain and water through it

sentences.english: I want to get off at the next station.
sentences.chinese: 我要在下一站下车。

sentences.english: Grand Central Station
sentences.chinese: 中央火车站

sentences.english: Is there a waiting room in the station?
sentences.chinese: 车站里有候车室吗？

sentences.english: the city bus station
sentences.chinese: 市内公共汽车站

detailed_translations.english: a place where trains or buses regularly stop so that passengers can get on and off, goods can be loaded etc, or the buildings at such a place
to send someone in the military to a particular place for a period of time as part of their military duty

sentences.english: All the schools have music and dancing as part of the curriculum.
sentences.chinese: 每个学校都设有音乐课和舞蹈课。

sentences.english: Let's go dancing tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我们今晚去跳舞吧。

detailed_translations.english: When people dance for enjoyment or to entertain others, you can refer to this activity as dancing

sentences.english: a heart monitor
sentences.chinese: 心脏监测仪

detailed_translations.chinese: 班长；监视器，检测器；显示器
detailed_translations.english: a television or part of a computer with a screen, on which you can see pictures or information
to carefully watch and check a situation in order to see how it changes over a period of time

sentences.english: Teachers will be asked to fill in a questionnaire.
sentences.chinese: 教师们将被要求填写一份调查问卷。

detailed_translations.english: a written set of questions which you give to a large number of people in order to collect information

sentences.english: The silver spoon tarnished.
sentences.chinese: 银匙失去光泽了。

sentences.english: Her teeth were capped with silver.
sentences.chinese: 她的牙齿是包了银的。

sentences.english: The workers parted gold from silver in the workshop.
sentences.chinese: 在车间里工人们把金子从银子中提炼出来。

sentences.english: The teacher provided some different materials and left the children to experiment.
sentences.chinese: 老师提供了几种不同的材料让孩子们试验。

detailed_translations.english: to try using various ideas, methods etc to find out how good or effective they are
a scientific test done to find out how something reacts under certain conditions, or to find out if a particular idea is true

sentences.english: the age of the silicon chip
sentences.chinese: 芯片时代

sentences.english: chip technology
sentences.chinese: 芯片技术

detailed_translations.chinese: 屑片， 碎片； 炸土豆条； 集成电路片， 集成块； 缺口， 瑕疵
detailed_translations.english: a small piece of  silicon  that has a set of complicated electrical connections on it and is used to store and  process  information in computers

sentences.english: Young Geoffrey made money by chopping and selling firewood.
sentences.chinese: 年轻的杰弗里靠砍柴卖柴挣钱。

detailed_translations.english: wood that has been cut or collected in order to be burned in a fire

sentences.english: I need more information.
sentences.chinese: 我需要更多信息。

detailed_translations.english: facts or details that tell you something about a situation, person, event etc

sentences.english: In this month’s competition you could win a prize worth £3,000.
sentences.chinese: 在本月的竞赛中您可以赢得价值3,000英镑的奖品。

sentences.english: The first prize has gone to Dr John Gentle.
sentences.chinese: 获得一等奖的是约翰·金特尔博士。

sentences.english: The prizes are awarded (= given ) every year to students who have shown original thinking in their work.
sentences.chinese: 这些奖项每年颁发给在学习中表现出创造性思维的学生。

sentences.english: The total prize money was £30,000.
sentences.chinese: 奖金总额为3万英镑。

detailed_translations.english: something that is given to someone who is successful in a competition, race, game of chance etc
to think that someone or something is very important or valuable
good enough to win a prize or having won a prize

sentences.english: An inspection was carried out at the school.
sentences.chinese: 有人来学校视察了一遍。

sentences.english: However, on closer inspection, a number of problems emerged.
sentences.chinese: 然而，经进一步检查，很多问题冒了出来。

detailed_translations.english: an official visit to a building or organization to check that everything is satisfactory and that rules are being obeyed

sentences.english: You can use the gym and pool for a fee of £35 a month.
sentences.chinese: 月付35英镑，即可使用健身房和游泳池。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that you pay to do something or that you pay to a professional person for their work

sentences.english: We’ll have to budget more carefully.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须更仔细地安排开支。

sentences.english: This scheme enables you to budget the cost through fixed monthly payments.
sentences.chinese: 这个计划可以让你把费用分摊在每个月里等额偿还。

sentences.english: Cheap flights are available from budget travel agents from $240.
sentences.chinese: 起价$240的廉价机票可从一些经济旅行社那里买到。

detailed_translations.english: to carefully plan and control how much money you spend and what you will buy with it

detailed_translations.chinese: 低廉的， 收费公道的
detailed_translations.english: Budget is used in advertising to suggest that something is being sold cheaply
the money that is available to an organization or person, or a plan of how it will be spent

sentences.english: Your father took out insurance to cover the mortgage.
sentences.chinese: 你父亲购买了抵押借款保险。

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement with a company in which you pay them money, especially regularly, and they pay the costs if something bad happens, for example if you become ill or your car is damaged

sentences.english: I’m worried about my husband’s health.
sentences.chinese: 我担心我丈夫的健康状况。

sentences.english: Even if you haven’t got much money, at least you’ve got your health.
sentences.chinese: 即使你没有太多钱，但起码你拥有健康。

detailed_translations.english: the general condition of your body and how healthy you are

sentences.english: They own a lot of land.
sentences.chinese: 他们拥有许多土地。

sentences.english: He bought a piece of land.
sentences.chinese: 他买了一块地。

sentences.english: After 21 days at sea, we sighted land.
sentences.chinese: 经过21天的海上航行，我们见到了陆地。

detailed_translations.english: an area of ground, especially when used for farming or building

sentences.english: The garage charges £30 an hour for labour.
sentences.chinese: 汽车修理厂收取每小时30英镑的人工费。

sentences.english: Many women do hard manual labour(= work with their hands ).
sentences.chinese: 许多妇女从事繁重的体力劳动。

sentences.english: Workers withdrew their labour (= protested by stopping work ) for twenty-four hours.
sentences.chinese: 工人罢工24小时。

sentences.english: a shortage of skilled labor
sentences.chinese: 熟练工人短缺

detailed_translations.english: work, especially physical work

sentences.english: I helped him choose the furniture for his house.
sentences.chinese: 我帮他挑选房子里用的家具。

sentences.english: I can’t think of a single piece of furniture in my house that I bought new.
sentences.chinese: 我想不出家里有哪件家具是新买的。

sentences.english: office furniture
sentences.chinese: 办公室家具

detailed_translations.english: large objects such as chairs, tables, beds, and cupboards

sentences.english: Air bags are a standard feature in most new cars.
sentences.chinese: 气囊是大多数新车的标准配置。

sentences.english: Striped tails are a common feature of many animals.
sentences.chinese: 尾巴上有条纹是许多动物的共同特征。

sentences.english: The hotel’s only redeeming features (= things that make it acceptable ) were that it was cheap and near the city centre.
sentences.chinese: 这家旅馆仅有的可取之处就是价格低廉并且靠近市中心。

sentences.english: One of the distinguishing features (= features that are different from other things of the same sort ) of modern banking is its dependence on computers.
sentences.chinese: 现代银行业的显著特征之一就是依赖电脑。

sentences.english: It's a great film and it features a Spanish actor who is going to be a world star within a year.
sentences.chinese: 那是一部精彩的电影，它由一位西班牙演员主演，他一年之内就会成为国际明星。

sentences.english: The hour-long programme will be updated each week and feature highlights from recent games.
sentences.chinese: 这个一小时的节目将每周更新，重点介绍近期比赛的精彩部分。

detailed_translations.chinese: 特征，特色；面貌；特写，专题节目；故事片
detailed_translations.english: a part of something that you notice because it seems important, interesting, or typical
When something such as a film or exhibition features a particular person or thing, they are an important part of it

sentences.english: the Museum of Modern Art in New York
sentences.chinese: 纽约现代艺术博物馆

sentences.english: an example of early Indian art
sentences.chinese: 印度早期艺术的范例

sentences.english: Television is ruining the art of conversation.
sentences.chinese: 电视在糟蹋会话艺术。

detailed_translations.english: the use of painting, drawing,  sculpture  etc to represent things or express ideas

sentences.english: Some members refused to participate.
sentences.chinese: 有些会员拒绝参加。

detailed_translations.english: to take part in an activity or event

sentences.english: Only 12 people attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 只有12个人出席了会议。

sentences.english: Please let us know if you are unable to attend.
sentences.chinese: 如果不能出席，请通知我们。

sentences.english: On his deathbed the General was attended by several doctors.
sentences.chinese: 将军临终时有几名医生在照料他。

detailed_translations.english: to go to an event such as a meeting or a class

sentences.english: She’s gone to Italy on a special assignment.
sentences.chinese: 她去意大利执行一项特殊任务。

sentences.english: a history assignment
sentences.chinese: 历史作业

detailed_translations.english: a piece of work that is given to someone as part of their job

sentences.english: The Government are planning further cuts in public spending.
sentences.chinese: 政府正计划进一步削减公共支出。

sentences.english: The US government has tightened restrictions on firearms.
sentences.chinese: 美国政府已经加强了对枪支的管制。

sentences.english: Neither party had the majority necessary to form a government.
sentences.chinese: 两个政党都没有获得组阁所必需的多数票。

sentences.english: strong government
sentences.chinese: 强有力的统治

detailed_translations.english: the group of people who govern a country or state

sentences.english: The fund was set up to try to save the cathedral.
sentences.chinese: 设立基金以挽救大教堂。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that is collected and kept for a particular purpose
to provide money for an activity, organization, event etc

sentences.english: The average salary for a teacher is $39,000 a year.
sentences.chinese: 教师的平均工资是39,000美元一年。

detailed_translations.english: money that you receive as payment from the organization you work for, usually paid to you every month

sentences.english: I have never betrayed a confidence.
sentences.chinese: 我从未泄露过别人的秘密。

sentences.english: They spent their evenings drinking wine and sharing confidences.
sentences.chinese: 晚上他们就喝喝酒，说说知心话。

detailed_translations.english: a secret or a piece of information that is private or personal

sentences.english: Have you signed the hotel register ?
sentences.chinese: 你在酒店登记簿上签名了吗？

sentences.english: Police want a national register of DNA samples.
sentences.chinese: 警方想要一个全国范围的DNA样本登记册。

sentences.english: How many students have registered for English classes?
sentences.chinese: 有多少学生注册选修英语课了？

detailed_translations.english: an official list of names of people, companies etc, or a book that has this list
to put someone’s or something’s name on an official list

sentences.english: We can be flexible about your starting date.
sentences.chinese: 你具体从哪天开始，我们可以灵活一点。

sentences.english: The government needs a more flexible approach to education.
sentences.chinese: 政府在处理教育问题上需要更加灵活。

detailed_translations.english: a person, plan etc that is flexible can change or be changed easily to suit any new situation

sentences.english: Enter your password, then click on the ‘proceed’ icon.
sentences.chinese: 键入密码，然后点击“继续”图标。

sentences.english: Give your user name and password.
sentences.chinese: 输入用户名和密码。

detailed_translations.english: a secret group of letters or numbers that you must type into a computer before you can use a system or program

sentences.english: The bed can be folded flat for storage.
sentences.chinese: 这张床可以折扁存放。

sentences.english: He lay flat on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 他平躺在地板上。

sentences.english: That night I lay flat on my back and stared up at the ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 那一夜，我仰面平躺，眼睛直直地盯着天花板。

detailed_translations.chinese: 平直地； 直截了当地
detailed_translations.english: in a position in which the surface of something is against another surface without curving or sloping

detailed_translations.chinese: 平的；固定的；漏气的；单调的，沉闷的；浅的
detailed_translations.english: smooth and level, without raised or hollow areas, and not sloping or curving
a place for people to live that consists of a set of rooms that are part of a larger building
